title: Toaru Kagaku no Railgun: Entenka no Satsuei Model mo Raku Ja Arimasen wa ne.

synonyms: Toaru Kagaku no Railgun: Episode 13' - Being a Photo Shoot Model Under the Hot Sun Isn't Easy, Is It?
alternative_titles.en: A Certain Scientific Railgun: Being a Photo Shoot Model Under the Blazing Sun Isn't Easy, Is It?
alternative_titles.ja: とある科学の超電磁砲(レールガン) 13'話『炎天下の撮影モデルも楽じゃありませんわね。』

synopsis: Special beach episode bundled with the official visual book.
